programme.desc: Ba bhreá le Lola dá mbeadh páirt "an ghrian" aici i ndráma na scoile. (Lola has her heart set on playing the sun in an upcoming school production.)

programme.title: Petronix Defenders
programme.desc: Tá an banphrionsa Petswiper ag cur iallach ar a piongain nua eitilt. (Princess Petswiper makes her new pet penguin fly.)

programme.title: Banainmhithe
programme.desc: Faigheann Ruairí agus Ailfí amach nach ionann saoirse agus gan aon rialacha a bheith ann. (Rodney and Alfie learn that freedom and lack of authority are not the same thing.)

programme.title: Angelo Rules
programme.desc: Tá Angelo ag iarraidh a bheith ar chomhairle na scoile. (Angelo wants to join the school council.)

programme.title: Angelo Rules
programme.desc: Téann cleas Angelo as smacht. (Angelo pulls some pranks at a sleepover with his friends - until one goes horribly wrong.)

programme.title: Cúla4
programme.desc: Níl aon easpa cláracha do dhaoine óga ar Cúla4 - bí ag spraoi agus ag foghlaim in éineacht linn. (Younger audiences will be spoilt for choice with Cúla4 - watch, play and learn.)

programme.title: Super Simple Amhráin
programme.desc: Amhrán spraíúil faoi bheannú do dhuine a bheidh againn inniu. (A fun song about saying Hello!)

programme.title: Blocuimhreacha
programme.desc: Cuireann Deich na deich n-amhrán is fearr i ndomhan na mblocuimhreacha i láthair. (Ten introduces the ten best songs trending in numberland at the moment.)

programme.title: Blocdhathanna
programme.desc: Casann Gorm le Dúghorm agus Spéirghorm den chéad uair. (Today, Blue meets Dark Blue and Sky Blue for the first time.)

programme.title: Fíricí Fíochmhara
programme.desc: Beidh an coimeádaí zú John ag tabhairt aire do na piongainí inniu. (John the zookeeper introduces kids to the charming world of penguins.)

programme.title: Seal le Timmy
programme.desc: Tá Timmy agus a chairde ag spraoi le traenacha. (Timmy and his classmates are playing trains.)

programme.title: Pip & Posy
programme.desc: Piocann Pip Zac ar a fhoireann in áit Posy agus níl Posy sásta! (When Pip picks Zac to be in his team for the wheelbarrow race Posy is upset.)

programme.title: Bígí ag Ceol
programme.desc: Amhrán faoi do lá breithe a bheidh le cumadh inniu. (On this episode we write a song about our birthday.)

programme.title: Saol Faoi Shráid
programme.desc: Tagann Ribín agus Glibín ar ghas pónaire. (Ribín & Glibín discover a beanstalk.)

programme.title: Curious George
programme.desc: Tá George le cabhrú leis an gCócaire Pisghetti sa chistin. (George decides to help Chef Pisghetti in the kitchen as he is cooking a meal for a famous restaurant critic.)

programme.title: Nuair a Bheidh Mé Mór
programme.desc: Samhlaíonn Sonaí an saol a bheidh aige ina dhíoltóir leabhar nuair a bheidh sé mór. (Sonaí imagines his life working in a bookshop when he grows up.)

programme.title: Daisy & Ollie
programme.desc: Faigheann na páistí amach faoin méid a bhíonn ar bun ag na Cluichí Oilimpeacha. (Daisy and Ollie learn about the Sports Olympics and take part in it themselves.)

programme.title: Deer Squad
programme.desc: Déanann an tOllamh Tochais meaisín atá in ann sram plaisteach a dhéanamh don Uasal Cruach. (Professor Scratch unveils a machine to make plastic slime for Sir Steel.)

programme.title: Ainmhithe Craiceáilte
programme.desc: I measc na n-ainmhithe a bheidh ar chlár an lae inniu beidh pandaí ag spraoi agus coiníní ag múineadh. (Today we'll see pandas play, dogs dive and rabbits teach.)

programme.title: Comhrá
programme.desc: Is é Tom Neilí Ó Mainnín as Tíorabháin a bheidh ag comhrá le Máirtín Tom Sheáinín. (Tom Neilí Ó Mainnín from Tíorabháin joins Máirtín Tom Sheáinin on the programme.)

programme.title: The Wonder Years
programme.desc: Tá imní ar Kevin, Winnie agus a gcairde faoi na scrúduithe iontrála don choláiste. (Kevin, Winnie and their friends are nervous about taking their college entrance exams.)

programme.title: Geantraí
programme.desc: Martin Tourish a chuirfidh an clár seo i láthair. Piano Accordion player and composer Martin Tourish presents this week¿s Geantraí from The Corner House in Ardara.)

programme.title: Domhan an Dúlra
